title: Bell Pull, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, wool, linen, cotton, brass handles
Technique: counted stitch embroidery in silk and wool on linen canvas, cotton plain cloth, brass handles
dimensions: Overall: 194 x 11.2 cm (6 ft. 4 3/8 in. x 4 7/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Bell pull made of canvas with embroidery, arranged as cross borders, in floral and geometric designs; brass handles at either end, pierced in design of Chinese type. Embroidery in canvas stitches. Backed with yellow cotton plain cloth.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bell Pull, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk, wool, linen, cotton, brass handles
Technique: counted stitch embroidery in silk and wool on linen canvas, cotton plain cloth, brass handles. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-70-a/c.
